info.title: Consolidation Fund Hierarchy
info.description: A consolidation fund hierarchy is a structure of funds in consolidation. The service provides general information about the hierarchy, like the validity timeframe, as well as structural information about the defined nodes and their consolidation fund leaf assignments.

x-sap-shortText: Read consolidation fund hierarchies in SAP S/4HANA Cloud for group reporting using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - Cloud Consolidation Data Collection Integration (SAP_COM_0241)
Finance - Cloud Consolidation Master Data for Group Reporting Integration (SAP_COM_0336)
[Group Reporting - Data from SAP Group Reporting Data Collection (287)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/287 " Link To BP ")
[Group Reporting - Data from External Systems (2U6)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2U6 " Link To BP ")
